Source.Name: libstatgrab
Source.Summary: Library for accessing information from the system for statistical purposes
Source.Description: libstatgrab is a library for accessing information from the system for statistical purposes. It could be used for software that monitors the system for alerting or graphing purposes.

Package.Summary: Library for accessing information from the system for statistical purposes
